Sentencas: Pt modified BaZr0.76Y0.2Ni0.04O3 (BZYN) is fabricated and characterized as a stable electrolyte for protonconducting solid oxide fuel cell (H-SOFC).
Titulo: A novel platinum modified barium zirconate-based electrolyte for enhanced solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The utilization of X-ray diffraction method (XRD) and transmission electron microscopy (TEM) enables the identification of the presence of platinum (Pt) in both the crystal lattice sites and the grain interface.
Titulo: A novel platinum modified barium zirconate-based electrolyte for enhanced solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This occurrence contributes to a reduction in grain boundary resistance.
Titulo: A novel platinum modified barium zirconate-based electrolyte for enhanced solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Consequently, this phenomenon improves the conductivity of the electrolyte.
Titulo: A novel platinum modified barium zirconate-based electrolyte for enhanced solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of the single cell with Pt-modified BZY electrolyte is improved by the reduction of ohmic resistance and enhancement of ion migration.
Titulo: A novel platinum modified barium zirconate-based electrolyte for enhanced solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This signifies a noteworthy advancement in the creation of more efficient and durable protonconducting SOFCs.
Titulo: A novel platinum modified barium zirconate-based electrolyte for enhanced solid oxide fuel cell performance
